meanings.definition: The quality or state of being well-suited or apt
meanings.sent1: Her choice of words demonstrated the felicitousness of her communication skills.
meanings.sent2: The felicitousness of the match between the colors of the room impressed everyone.
meanings.sent3: The felicitousness of the cat wearing a tiny hat made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The felicitousness of the melody dancing through the air enchanted the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The felicitousness of the puzzle pieces fitting perfectly together was a joy to behold.

meanings.definition: The quality of being pleasing or fortunate
meanings.sent1: The felicitousness of the weather on their wedding day made the couple ecstatic.
meanings.sent2: She was grateful for the felicitousness of finding her lost keys in the first place she looked.
meanings.sent3: The felicitousness of the unexpected gift brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent4: The felicitousness of the situation was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The felicitousness of the outcome left everyone feeling content and happy.
